mapper.select: select grandParent.version ,grandParent.os ,max(grandParent.DEV_PATH) DEV_PATH ,max(grandParent.PREPRD_PATH) PREPRD_PATH ,max(grandParent.PRD_PATH) PRD_PATH from( select parent.version , parent.os , case when parent.env = 'DEV' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end AS 'DEV_PATH' , case when parent.env = 'PREPRED' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end AS 'PREPRD_PATH' , case when parent.env = 'PRD' then parent.file_name ELSE '' end AS 'PRD_PATH' from ( select version, os, env, file_name , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY mdfy_date desc) as rm from app_mykt ) as parent group by version, os, env order by parent.rm desc, version desc ) as grandParent group by grandParent.os, grandParent.version;
